item.title: Kenya demands safety for its citizens after Tanzania's post-poll crackdown
item.description: Some Kenyans have reportedly been killed, injured and others detained by Tanzanian security officers.

item.title: Fifty-four people injured in mosque blast at Jakarta high school
item.description: Authorities say the explosion occurred during Friday prayers at a mosque inside a high school complex.

item.title: Elon Musk's $1tn pay deal approved by Tesla shareholders
item.description: The richest man in the world will get hundreds of millions of new shares if he hits his targets.

item.title: China launches new aircraft carrier in naval race with the US
item.description: The Fujian uses electromagnetic catapults that allow planes to strike from a greater distance.

item.title: Multiple people fall ill after package delivered to Air Force One base
item.description: The building the package was opened in was evacuated and those taken ill were found to be stable.
